mapper.update: update timeline set timeline_title = #{timelineTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timeline_desc = #{timelineDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timeline_update_time = #{timelineUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, timeline_status = #{timelineStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where timeline_id = #{timelineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select timeline_id, timeline_title, timeline_desc, timeline_update_time, timeline_status, user_id from timeline where timeline_id = #{timelineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select timeline_id, timeline_title, timeline_desc, timeline_update_time, timeline_status, user_id from timeline
